sentences.sContent: This is the cultural play of signification that theorists have discussed as if it were an inalterable feature of life.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the cultural play of signification that theorists have discussed as if it were an inalterable feature of life.
sentences.sCn: 这就是理论家们谈论的意义的文化游戏，仿佛它是生活的固定不变的特性。
